name: Seed of the moment
description:
Every moment is unique. In the same way, this work is the result of a particular moment in time at my studio, where many unexpected things may happen patching several analog video synthesizers combined with 3D animations composed in processing. This piece is what I consider a "true" glitch, as the machines somehow trapped some feedback creating this mesmerizing effect. This instant cannot ever be repeated and should be appreciated as such. The central shape its sort of a seed flower that pulsates in a code-based animation. 
Hardware:
Ambery PIPV3
Korg SQ-1 Step sequencer
3TrinsRGB+1c
JVC Video Editing Processor JX-SV55
Videonics Video Equalizer VE-1

Software:
Blender3D
Processing 4
OBS, VLC, Handbrake
